name: SKDocumentIndexState
desc: The indexing state of a document.

items.name: var kSKDocumentStateNotIndexed: SKDocumentIndexState
items.desc: Specifies that the document is not indexed.

items.name: var kSKDocumentStateIndexed: SKDocumentIndexState
items.desc: Specifies that the document is indexed.

items.name: var kSKDocumentStateAddPending: SKDocumentIndexState
items.desc: Specifies that the document is not in the index but will be added after the index is flushed or closed.

items.name: var kSKDocumentStateDeletePending: SKDocumentIndexState
items.desc: Specifies that the document is in the index but will be deleted after the index is flushed or closed.
